current_reports.title: Market Opening Intelligence
current_reports.description: Latest AI-powered market analysis with global discovery insights
key_highlights: Top Catalyst: Friday's Personal Consumption Expenditures (PCE) inflation data, the Federal Reserve's preferred inflation gauge. A benign or cooler-than-expected reading would significantly bolster hopes for rate cuts and likely propel indices to new highs, particularly the S&P 500 and Nasdaq. Conversely, an uptick could trigger profit-taking.

key_highlights: Top Catalyst: Upcoming key inflation data (e.g., PCE price index, July 2024 CPI); further commentary from Federal Reserve officials; Q2 corporate earnings season outlooks (starting mid-July).
